steps: Open the Microsoft Word document called Document11.docx.
Click on the 'Review' tab in the ribbon.
In the 'Tracking' group, click on the 'Track Changes' button to enable track changes mode.
Review the document and make any necessary changes or edits.
In the 'Tracking' group, click on the 'Inspect Document' button.
A dialog box will appear. Click on the 'Inspect' button.
Wait for the inspection process to complete.
Review the inspection results and make any necessary changes or edits.
